column4: Hi, I was wondering how I can set up my peap account for my wireless connection
is there such thing as a GUi?
anything better than xsupplicant out there?
How can I make my PEAP/EAP work even if I dont need a certificate, cuz in windows the server asks me for the certificate himlesf
How can I make my PEAP/EAP work even if I dont need a certificate, cuz in windows the server asks me for the certificate himlesf
in xsupplicant set the certificate to NONE
set all certificate parameters to None
whats the difference between wpa_supplicant and xsupplicant
I dont seem to really understand how the work toghetheer
ok ,so for peap xsupplicant is good enough
so for root_dir and root_cert i set them to none or comment them out...
